channel.title: When you click on a skill a menu comes up
channel.description: How do i make it so when you click on the skill in the skill tab a menu comes up for that skill?

item.title: When you click on a skill a menu comes up
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Fan_XX SSG Fan XX
item.description:
@SSG_Fan_XX wrote:

um I was looking through this code and found this

		sendQuest("", 8175;

Before the ; add a ) ppl…>.> Its a common mistake don’t be alarmed lol

Read full topic

item.source: When you click on a skill a menu comes up

item.title: When you click on a skill a menu comes up
item.dc:creator: @bonesdog bonesdog
item.description:
@bonesdog wrote:

Search for:

case 185:

(it may at the end say like //clicking most buttons or somthing)
and add this:

[code] case 33206: //Attack
break;

				case 33209: //Strength
				break;

				case 33212: //Defence
				break;

				case 33215: //Range
				break;

				case 33218: //Prayer 
				break;

				case 33221: //Magic
				break;

				case 33224: //Runecrafting
				break;

				case 33207: //Hitpoints
				break;

				case 33210: //Agility
				break;

				case 33213: //Herblore
				break;

				case 33216: //Theiving
				break;

				case 33219: //Crafting
				break;

				case 33222: //Fletching
			        break;

				case 47130: //Slayer
				break;

				case 33208: //Mining
				break;

				case 33211: //Smithing
				break;

				case 33214: //Fishing
				break;

				case 33217: //Cooking
				break;

				case 33220: //Firemaking
				break;

				case 33223: //Woodcutting
				break;

				case 54104: //Farming
				break;[/code]

Now if you want it to open a menu first search for somthing like: (You public voids)

public void Main() {
or

public void Help() {
and add:

public void AttackMenu() { sendQuest("@dre@Attack Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 8145); sendQuest("", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("", 8158); sendQuest("", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("", 8161); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuest("", 8163); sendQuest("", 8164); sendQuest("", 8165); sendQuest("", 8166); sendQuest("", 8167); sendQuest("", 8168); sendQuest("", 8169); sendQuest("", 8170); sendQuest("", 8171); sendQuest("", 8172); sendQuest("", 8173); sendQuest("", 8174); sendQuest("", 8175); sendQuest("", 8176); sendQuest("", 8177); sendQuest("", 8178); sendQuest("", 8179); sendQuest("", 8180); sendQuest("", 8181); sendQuest("", 8182); sendQuest("", 8183); sendQuest("", 8184); sendQuest("", 8185); sendQuest("", 8186); sendQuest("", 8188); sendQuest("", 8189); sendQuest("", 8190); sendQuest("", 8191); sendQuest("", 8192); sendQuest("", 8193); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Now change the attack case to:

case 33206: //Attack AttackMenu(); break;

(I could make a menu just like runescape but im just little lazy)
Now do that for all the other skillz and there you go. Whatever skill you click opens up the menu.

Read full topic
